markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Sahkil](/Traits.aspx?ID=333)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #162: Ruins of the Radiant Siege](/Sources.aspx?ID=54) pg. 84</row>

Sahkils are fiends that delight in spreading fear and unease among mortal creatures. They typically have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), immunity to fear, and weakness to good.
name: Sahkil
